mapper.insert: insert into userbankinfo (bankName, accountName, bankNumber, forkName, userinfoId) values (#{bankName}, #{accountName}, #{bankNumber}, #{forkName}, #{userinfoId})
mapper.update: update userbankinfo set bankName = #{bankName}, accountName = #{accountName}, bankNumber = #{bankNumber}, forkName = #{forkName}, userinfoId = #{userinfoId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, bankName, accountName, bankNumber, forkName, userinfoId from userbankinfo
